title._content: Luis Izquierdo, Augusto Villanueva, Henry P. Fletcher, W.D. Straight  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Luis Izquierdo, Augusto Villanueva, Henry P. Fletcher, W.D. Straight 1915 May 14 (date created or published later by Bain) 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title and date from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows Henry P. Fletcher, U.S Ambassador to Chile from 1910 to 1916 with former Chilean Foreign Minister Luis Izquierdo and Augusto Villanueva, Director General of the Bank of Chile. The men were in New York City on their way to the Pan American Financial Conference on May 24, 1915 in Washington. Also depicted is banker and diplomat Willard D. Straight (1880-1918), a member of the committee meeting the conference delegates.(Source: Flickr Commons project, 2012) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.19098 Call Number: LC-B2- 3478-1
